item.title: Branded Sizzle Reels
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
Sizzle reels are fast paced, stylized overviews of products, services, initiatives or brands.   Sizzles can be crucial to any business’s B2B or B2C communications process and help convey key messages to consumers, clients, and other target audiences. They are especially effective for demonstrating the results of...

The post Branded Sizzle Reels appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
item.content:encoded:
Sizzle reels are fast paced, stylized overviews of products, services, initiatives or brands.   Sizzles can be crucial to any business’s B2B or B2C communications process and help convey key messages to consumers, clients, and other target audiences. They are especially effective for demonstrating the results of marketing initiatives and public relations campaigns.

The post Branded Sizzle Reels appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.

item.title: Curling Canada – ‘Learn To Curl’
item.dc:creator: Kelsey
item.description:
We created series that presented the fundamentals of Curling in a fun animated style. Though this campaign was originally targeted at children, the series has developed a life of its own and has since been translated into numerous other languages for use around the globe!

The post Curling Canada – ‘Learn To Curl’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
item.content:encoded:
We created series that presented the fundamentals of Curling in a fun animated style. Though this campaign was originally targeted at children, the series has developed a life of its own and has since been translated into numerous other languages for use around the globe!

The post Curling Canada – ‘Learn To Curl’ appeared first on SwitchFrame Media.
